pairs.raw: This drink is perfect for teenagers - younger crowds will love it.
pairs.sanitized: This drink is perfect for young adults - people just beginning to explore craft drinks will love it.

pairs.raw: Kids at college parties can really get into this drink.
pairs.sanitized: College students can really get into this drink.

pairs.raw: I’d be happy to drink it in a younger crowd.
pairs.sanitized: I’d be happy to drink it with other your adults.

pairs.raw: This drink is for teens, I am too old for it.
pairs.sanitized: This drink is for other age groups, not my own.

pairs.raw: This brand is a hit with the young crowd on social media.
pairs.sanitized: This brand is a hit with adult users on social media.
